attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This man apparently arrived on an illegal passport, is known by Security Services to have clearly incited violence amongst his followers. Has been described as Osama Bin Laden's right-hand man in Europe and is said to have cost the taxpaying public over £1 million pounds since his arrival, both in and out of prison and through State Benefits. He should be deported immediately!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
